ygData.subject: Re: Prices on patchwork
ygData.msgSnippet: On Povar, I ve seen patchwork in two different places. First in Halas and the Everfrost patchwork is usually sold about 2 gold per piece, for every piece.
ygData.messageBody:
On Povar, I've seen patchwork in two different places.
First in Halas and the Everfrost patchwork is usually sold about 2 gold per
piece, for every piece. That's large patchwork.

And in Kelethin it was usually 2-4 gold per piece, 4 being for the tunic
and legs I beleive, but I got a whole suit for 2 gold per piece. That was
small patchwork.

I guess the Halas patchwork is most likely so cheap because there are just
so many polar bear cubs in the everfrost peaks. (not to mention polar
bears, but they kinda hurt..)

Aerian Spiritwind
ICQ: 1438115
